website_summaries.verdict: Taller and more spacious insulated carrier for up to 6 wine bottles, with removable divider to convert to a general cooler.
pros: Thermal-insulated material and 5mm PE foam insulates and protects 6 bottles of wine
Thick padding keeps beverages cold for hours, and adjustable shoulder strap makes transporting your wine convenient
Removable inside divider keeps wine bottles separate and prevents them from hitting each other
Pockets on outside of carrier to carry other needed items
cons: An added pocket for an ice pack might be an improvement to this carrier

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these wines carriers because the price was good. They're better than I expected and seem to help keep the wine from getting overheated, 'though I don't put them in the trunk on a hot day. They're also handy for just carrying six bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: RLS42

customer_reviews.title: Only works well when there are 6 bottles in the bag
customer_reviews.text: If the bag is not full, then the separator shifts around and the bottles will knock together.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bottle and Wine Carrier for RV use
customer_reviews.text: We love the bottle wine carrier. We use it in the airstream during travel. It is medium size and has a flexible insert. Perfect for tight spaces. It is insulated and I even put my grandsons bottles in for a quick grab n go. Easy to clean, sturdy and perfect for RV travel. Fits right under my sink area in the Airstream, out of the way. We are happy with the purchase. I looked a long time for the perfect size. This is it. Just big enough for your needs but doesn't take up to much space due to excellent quality and design. I would recommend to airstream and RV owners.
customer_reviews.author: Linda pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Wine bag is cute but I ordered the black and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wine bag is cute but I ordered the black and received a blue one. Also, it had puncture holes under the lid. I need the bag for a bridal trip this coming weekend so I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very flimsy. The dividers are not built in and are very thin. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, divider not effective.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. Dividers are a flimsy insert. This item is useless for glass bottles unless you have exactly six bottles because the cheap/flimsy insert let's the bottles hit each other and break.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Have to be drunk to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. Anyone who rated it higher must have been drinking when they did the review. The insert that is supposed to hold the wine is a joke. Poorly made...I couldn’t get six wine coolers in, let alone my expensive wine. Will be returning this promptly!
customer_reviews.author: Bret K. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Wine Tote
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is good but some features were not as I would have liked. I had to fit 6 Chardonnay bottles in this tote. They were so very tight, I could barely get them to fit. Also the internal separator is very poor quality. They need to attach to the sides and not be free floating. Also it was larger enough to reach each side when you have the larger bottles inserted. It was good, but it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Errol

customer_reviews.title: Just a carrier not much for cooling..
customer_reviews.text: Will see..not the quality other Kato cooler..hope the handles hold up...have the 4 carried witch is better quality..ok as a carrier but not much as a real cooler..
customer_reviews.author: J Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Peformance as needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits 6 bottles, safely and securely transports them and maintains temp for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Right sized and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for transporting various beverages in our RV (overstock from fridge). The insulation and padding made this a great "second fridge". Great price - might buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: GCD Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. We were able to take 6 bottles of wine on the plane in our luggage. I did add cushion with bubble wrap, just from paranoia of the bottles breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Picnic bag
customer_reviews.text: While a decent cooler bag, the insert dividor supports are not enough tovtravelvwith wine bottles. I would describe this more of a picnic cooler bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pattik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good carrier at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a few times so far, but it seems to be pretty sturdy and conveniently sized. I actually use it for beer. I needed something that will hold different sizes from cans to large bottles. This does that nicely. Would give it 5 stars if it had slick little pouches built in for the cold / ice packs. There is room though, I'm just being picky now!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Close but no cigar
customer_reviews.text: I used it to store bottles of wine and liquor on a boat, to prevent them from rattling and damaging one another. I was disappointed to discover that the divider was not attached to the inside surface of the carrier as it also pears to be in the photo, but just a free floating piece.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight insulated - great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: The case is made to be a wine carrier but the interior dividers are removable so you can use it for a picnic or daily lunch. It's very sturdy and nice looking. I bought this for a birthday gift and love it so much I plan on buying one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well for traveling up to 6 bottles of wine. Will keep it cool if pressure chilled . Carrie's easy
customer_reviews.author: nhim2atl

customer_reviews.title: Works for the occasion
customer_reviews.text: The inner pieces are not good but I guess if you wanted to remove them its a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice But Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Color, design and intent all on point. However, the quality was BELOW AVERAGE. There were stitching threads all over the interior that we had to cut off. I stopped counting after 7. This is just poor quality control. The handles need to be made of slightly sturdier material such as a canvas quality. After all this was a 6 bottle tote and 6 bottles of wine are heavy. Minor but necessary improvements that would have made this item get a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottles not secure in bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. I am disappointed that the bottle section is a loose piece. That really disappointed me. I really wish it was attached. I put another 6 bottle carrier inside it to travel with today.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ridall

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when you need to take a “Bar in a Bag” to an event. The six compartments can hold liquor, wine, mixers, fruit, knife and corkscrew. Or what ever else suits your fancy. Price is right
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law liked it very much, it was a gift for her
customer_reviews.author: Maria Teresa Cerqueira

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet, but quality looks great. Also, great price and excellent shipping.
customer_reviews.author: capt

customer_reviews.title: the lining keeps the white wines cold for a good while and I've had no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong, durable wine tote bag. the lining keeps the white wines cold for a good while and I've had no problems with it. I liked it so much I bought two for larger events. I highly recommend this for picnics, parties or wine tasting events.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should do the trick
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a wine holder that will travel well, and this case seems sturdy and it will keep the bottles protected. I haven't used it yet but it appears to be durable and better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Termini

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a shipt shopper and uses these for delivering alcohol purchases. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Six Bottle Wine Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I like the insulation but didn't like the dividers on the inside (if you have fewer than six bottles they don't provide necessary bottle protection.
customer_reviews.author: Walter T. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, good price and quick delivery. Will not hold 6 pinot noir bottles but will hold 3 with 3 smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Tcart driver

customer_reviews.title: Great for transporting multiple Whiskey Bottles
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! A way to carry multiple bottles of Whiskey to get togethers or when going on a trip. The removeable/adjustable inner divider is great for when the bottle shapes/sizes are different.
customer_reviews.author: James Foy

customer_reviews.title: STITCHING NOT SUITABLE TO HOLD 6 BOTTLES!
customer_reviews.text: The stitching ripped on 3 of the four sides of the bag. I loaded 6 bottles only and immediately noticed the stitching ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: EH...
customer_reviews.text: It's a tad on the flimsy side. The partition is not affixed to the side of the cooler. Not really worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Calzolano

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy for the price  BUT
customer_reviews.text: Only 6-skinniest bottles will fit easily. put 6 bottles of chard in there and couldn't close zipper! worked it out by alternatin bottles top up/top down. appears well made. will review again after some elbow exercizes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This wine carrier is not very sturdy and padding is definitely an issue Won't keep this as I'd be afraid to carry Riedel glasses with our wines.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Wine Cooler Tote
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine totes. Keep everything organized great for byob or picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Tran

customer_reviews.title: I really like that you can pull the bottle divider out to ...
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for a trip to Florida. It stored 6 bottles and I didn't have to worry about packaging the bottles for travel. I really like that you can pull the bottle divider out to make it just a cooler. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: We used to travel with wine in a suitcase. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy carrier
customer_reviews.text: Convenient for backseat of car especially on hot days so the wine doesn’t spoil or fall over
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pogue

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! I'm glad I bought 2.
customer_reviews.text: These wine carriers are insulated and collapsible and suited for all types pf bottles. Made of a good quality material and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Item!
customer_reviews.text: I do private wine tastings and love that I can pack and carry chilled wine and it will stay chilled until I’m ready to pour.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I saw one that a friend had and immediately ordered one for myself! Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds 6 bottles
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for a long trip & also to transport 6 bottles of wine from store to home!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Fast service and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to find a wine carrier that was so affordable! Came fast and it was in great condition no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall and very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is designed for wine bottles and packs down well for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Br. Isaac Haywiser, O.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Mine looks more like a lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Not the product I received! Mine looks more like a lunch bag!
customer_reviews.author: pjm

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Doubles as an insulated carrying case for other liquids as well.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carrier
customer_reviews.text: We liked our first one so much we just bought a second!
customer_reviews.author: Flower Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Carries 6 bottles of wine onto our cruise in this. And then used as cooler at the beach. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: diane mello

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great as a gift. Only setback is the use of the material for the sling - too soft.
customer_reviews.author: kcationg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Will probably order a few more. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Deneen Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. I can carry my wines in style now
customer_reviews.author: Ayodhya Glenardi

customer_reviews.title: it fits bottles nicely and I like the padding
customer_reviews.text: I am using it as an alcohol bottle carrier, it fits bottles nicely and I like the padding. Can't really speak to the insulation capabilities. But it is perfect for what I need for road trips!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised but accomodates smaller bordeaux type  bottles better than wider burgundy type
customer_reviews.text: I have another Chinese made wine tote but the separator is fixed and holds the bottles in position better. It is slightly larger and accommodates bottles like champagne, rhone or burgundy without difficulty.This wine tote I will have to add additional padding before I would put this in a suitcase for airline travel. The tote is lined with reflective material but the size of the openings are 3 inches by 3 inches. That is fine for narrow bottles but champagne, chardonnay, burgundy are 3 3/8 to 3 1/2 inches and will stretch the compartment. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: It is not water tight, cannot hold ice, leaks, useless for me
customer_reviews.text: I figured this would be a great little cooler for bottle shares and bringing cans/bottles out on the golf course with some ice. Nope, it leaks out the bottom when the ice melts. Pretty useless for what I wanted it for. If you want to use ice to keep things cool, skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wine Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to take on a recent trip where we would be doing a lot of wine tasting. Having this bag with us was a life saver! Having something to put our wine purchases in while traveling from tasting room to tasting room was a huge help. I think I may need another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Although we haven't used it yet, it seems very well made. We are going on a Wine Cruise tour holiday, and my wife wanted something to use when we go shopping and want to buy a few bottles. We were going to buy the 4 bottle, but decided to get the 6 for almost the same price. Very happy with the purchase. When we ordered it, I was at a hotel in LA. The parcel arrived almost the next day, less than 2 days. Amazing delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Suzanne T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bag at the last minute, we were going on a trip and planned on taking some of our wine. We started looking and we found this bag that was one day delivery and we need that. We ordered the bag on Thursday and we were leaving Friday after working. The bag arrived about one hour before we left. It worked great and kept the wine chilled and is very strudy. We couldn't have been happier witht he bag or the serivce we recieved. Thank you!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and really didn't know what to expect, but I got in the mail and I was very impressed with the workmanship. I am able to easily put 6 bottles in it, and three big 1.5 lt bottles in it. I like it and recommend it for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Casebolt Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, well -made bag that we believe will be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well -made bag that we believe will be durable and serve us very well! We took it along to our favorite wine store the other evening and filled it. Straps are strong and well made. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great way to supply a party with the goods
customer_reviews.text: Great way to supply a party with the goods. I was skeptical when I unpacked it, but once all the bottles are in it’s perfect. Well worth the price......I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: andrew kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: It's not very tall and the insert doesn't attach to anything - it is like the insert of a cardboard liquor box. If you try to carry less than six bottles it moves around.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pajonas

customer_reviews.title: Multiple functions
customer_reviews.text: Received the wine cooler. Quality good. Like it can be used as a cooler as well as hold wine bottles so they don't bump into other bottles and break. Looking to purchase additional coolers.
customer_reviews.author: paint lady

customer_reviews.title: Made cheaply!
customer_reviews.text: Bad product and WAY overpriced! This is your typical cheap Chia product. Don't buy it... you won't like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Batt

customer_reviews.title: great travel cases
customer_reviews.text: I use these as travel cases in the car. They provide enough protection and the shoulder strap make them easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The wine cooler itself was great. The insert was a bit flimsy and took a while to fit correctly. We were in 106 degree heat and our wine stayed cool. Great product but please fix the bottle divider
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wine bottles or any bottles that need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wine bottles or any bottles that need to be kept cold. I own a mobile shaved ice company and needed a cool place to keep my toppings. This is the perfect solution. Seems well made, and the dividers are removable or adjustable. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carry you with me
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift and has different compartments for your wine bottles very nice
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Sosi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sales needs.
customer_reviews.text: I work for a distillery and do tastings on the road all the time. I bought one for every one at work! Love these. So convenient and awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for travel
customer_reviews.text: Good bag to keep your alcohol cool. The flexible interior must be packed carefully, so the glass doesn't knock.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tilton

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet but it appears to be well made ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but it appears to be well made. Once Spring arrives and the winery's in the area begin the WineFest's... I will be bringing this with me to hold the bottles I purchase and the bottle I am drinking. Hopefully it will make life easier and leave me with a free hand to hold my wine glass.
customer_reviews.author: robmski

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag.
customer_reviews.text: This holds flavor syrup so it doesn’t really travel. It’s decent.
customer_reviews.author: Fairykeiley

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed with the exception of the dividers
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the inserts were not attached. It makes it more difficult to use when the inserts (dividers) shift when putting the bottles in
customer_reviews.author: Larry Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Carried 6 bottles with no issues. Included was a bottle of Champagne, a Pinot Noir and a larger than normal cabernet bottle. I can't comment on durability since I've only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalUomo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have thos bag as a gift and my friend loved it! Seems very durable. Love the extra pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rorie

customer_reviews.title: Carries Six Bottles Safely and Easily
customer_reviews.text: The bag is lightweight but can handle six bottle easily. Time will tell if it's durable but, for now, I am very pleased with my purchase. Makes bringing wine to dinners/parties/holiday gatherings very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nilza S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, robust. We bought 2 to store our wine bottles in our RV
customer_reviews.author: John Strome

customer_reviews.title: Folds down nice. I do private wine tastings and need just ...
customer_reviews.text: Folds down nice. I do private wine tastings and need just something to keep bottles safe and cool en route and this works out just right. Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cooler. I went on a hike with this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. I went on a hike with this. I fit a whole picnic meal in here plus a couple bottles of wine. After 2 hours of hiking everything was still chilled to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bother.
customer_reviews.text: The interior ripped almost the instant I put something in it, then proceeded to leak everywhere. Complete garbage. This would be overpriced if it were free.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stotz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picnicking
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Item arrived on time & is exactly what I was looking for! Perfect for picnicking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 6 Bottle Wine Carrier - Insulated & Padded Wine Carrying Cooler Tote Bag with Handle and Adjustable Shoulder Strap for Travel or Picnic, IDEAL Wine Lover Gift, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black - 6 BottlesSKU :1KTWB600BK

Insulated bag is lightweight, durable and compact insulated food, wine container has a dual zip-around closure. It is made elaborately of durable 600D Polyester, insulated with the PU material which easy to clean and keep temperature cool for hours. 
The front pocket storing tools, napkin, snake etc. Thermal insulated compartment can hold 6 bottles of normal size red wine. The thick padding detachable divider prevent wine bottles from clinking or shattering, take it out and instantly turn it to a large picnic bag. Both side mesh pockets for additional storage space. Easy-grip handle & adjustable shoulder strap made it easy to carry.
wine carrier bag is a great bag for taking your wine, food and beverages to work, school, picnic and field trips while keeping them cold for hours.

Package Content:
1x 6 Bottles Wine bag
feature_bullets: PORTABLE WINE CARRIER - The strong handle, thick padded & thermal insulated material and adjustable shoulder strap make it the perfect wine carrier for outdoor activities. Great for transporting wine to parties, wine dinners, restaurants, pool or beach parties, picnics, concerts and sporting events. Put your wine in this bag and start your travel at ease!
PADDED & THERMAL-INSULATED - PU thermal insulated material and 5mm PE foam padding protect your bottles of wine from external collision, keep 6 bottles of wine intact and well chilled for hours.

REMOVABLE DIVIDER - The inside padded divider keeps 6 bottles of wine separate and prevent them from crashing with each other. It's also removable, you can use the wine bag as a insulated cooler bag for picnic or transporting water, beverage or beer….
AMPLE STORAGE SPACE - 11" x 7.5" x 13.5" (L x W x H), the large size wine carrier has ample space for 6 normal size bottles of wine.

IDEAL WINE LOVER GIFT - Elegant look and pratical design make this wine carrier suitable for all age wine lovers. If your families or friends are wine drinkers and love to share wine with others, this wine carrier would be a excellent gift for them.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
